requirements.summary: Increase the size of the logo image (nova logo-1.png) in the AppLayout header to make it more prominent and visible to users
acceptanceCriteria: Logo in AppLayout.tsx is visibly larger than current implementation
Logo maintains proper aspect ratio and quality
Logo fits well within the header layout on both desktop and mobile viewports
Logo does not cause layout shifts or overflow issues

file_operations.description: Increase the logo image dimensions in the header section. Modify the img element for 'nova logo-1.png' to use larger width and height values (e.g., increase from current size to approximately 150-200px width while maintaining aspect ratio). Ensure responsive behavior is preserved by using appropriate Tailwind classes (e.g., w-32 md:w-48 or similar) to scale appropriately on mobile and desktop viewports. Verify the logo does not cause overflow or alignment issues with adjacent navigation elements.
